context: considering the quality of goods from china, expect their space station to last roughly 6 weeks before a replacement is needed.

replies.context: A lot of the low quality goods coming from China are from American companies who set up factories over there for the cheap labor.
cheap and low quality is because u demands it. china can produce better products. its just a false stereotype.

context:
Pity that Julia Musto does not allow comment on other science articles.
Science is fun to talk about. She is trying to kill this section.

China is on the move and they are doing it with American money.   Meanwhile here in Columbus, Ohio our neighborhood can't even get mail delivery and our schools are closed this morning because of lack of bus drivers.   And the country that can't open schools or deliver the mail thinks it can compete with China?   What a joke.

replies.context: You should come up north to Delaware county. We are booming and have great schools. But I work in Columbus so have some empathy. Despite great churches up here, I belong to a church in Columbus, in part due to its outreach to the poor of the inner city. Columbus has its problems, like all big cities, but it still has a lot of potential for the future.

context: I am so glad biden is concentrating on making our military woke. Next he will replace seasoned warriors with social workers. That will make China fear the US!!

Good for China. Their government is despicable, but science transcends politics and ideologies.
Science makes for the best diplomacy, which is why we still share a Space Station wit the Russians.

replies.context: china shares virus with world, don't forget
The could have done a better job of containing the coronavirus. The USA is also guilty of not reacting quickly enough on the pandemic.

You forget that their Government funds all Science Activities and therefore spins the money with their political views and ideologies. Their government also reaps all the rewards for any other government programs.

Space BTW makes a perfect place to make new biological weapons. Very isolated.
Space would actually be the worst place to make a new biological weapon.

Their program is run by the military which should tell you all you need to know. Our relations with Russia has deteriorated to the point that they are accusing our astronauts of sabotaging their equipment.
One needs to know a LOT more than that.
They're not doing it for science.  Just watch, it'll be for something far more nefarious.
Our country does nefarious things too.

context: Hey America. In case you're not paying attention, we're sinking in global status in a lot of areas. Once China establishes their Space Base (like their fishing islands) then it will be the High Ground for their Military activities. As long as we keep sending them the money they'll continue to steam roll us, and we deserve it.
This is 100% CHINESE PROPAGANDA. The CHINESE harbor freight space program is a farse. CHINA will be rightfully obliterated for the death and destruction they've inflicted upon the world.

replies.context: And who do you think will obliterate the Chinese? The woke U.S. military?
The US military isn't as woke as you may be lead to believe.

Ummm, 66÷450= .146 or about 1/7.  So Chinas station when complete will be about 1/7 the size of ISS.

replies.context: No, just FOXNews’ failure to hire a few proofreaders.  A major oversight IMHO.
